definition: to set up/to arrange/to lay out
to arrange/to exhibit/to move to and fro/a pendulum
to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)

sentences.english: Get a book of positive , inspirational thoughts and keep it by your desk or by your pillow. Read one or two passages each day.
sentences.chinese: 桌上或案头摆放着一本励志书，每天都去朗读一两段。

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁炉架摆放了一些绿叶以使边线看起来柔和一点。

sentences.english: Reflect in the night, put on the table a glass of warm milk.
sentences.chinese: 体现在夜间，摆放在桌前那一杯温热的牛奶。

sentences.english: When putt in place, the block stones shall be bigger-face up with joints staggered.
sentences.chinese: 摆放块石时，石料应大面向上，缝隙相互错开。

sentences.english: Shoes and boots go right onto the waterproof mat laid out next to the wall, , and coats go on the coat rack behind the door.
sentences.chinese: 鞋靴摆放在靠墙的防水垫上，外套挂在门后。

sentences.english: Want to put your doctor's stethoscope in a twist?
sentences.chinese: 想用新花样摆放医生的听诊器吗？

sentences.english: The neater you pack them the more you can carry.
sentences.chinese: 你摆放得越整齐，能装进去的衣物就越多。

sentences.english: Always begin Tadasana by placing your feet.
sentences.chinese: 开始山式总是从摆放你的脚开始。

sentences.english: The sitting room in the bedroom puts sofa and tea table only, TV ark is dispensable.
sentences.chinese: 居室中客厅只摆放沙发与茶几，电视柜则可有可无。

sentences.english: Angling a tom slightly causes sound waves to scatter, and diffuses them.
sentences.chinese: 轻微调节落地桶鼓的摆放角度使声波散射和漫反射。

sentences.english: Arrange the chair, desk, and computer screen to avoid neck, wrist, and head pain.
sentences.chinese: 摆放好桌椅和电脑屏幕以免你的脖子，手腕和头疼痛。

sentences.english: The park showcased the statues of those martyrs who were killed during the failed uprising.
sentences.chinese: 陵园摆放着那些壮烈牺牲烈士们的石像。

sentences.english: The room was bare of all objects expect several packing crates placed around the room at random.
sentences.chinese: 房间的周围随意摆放一些包装用的柳条箱。

sentences.english: She was gathering flowers for dinner table.
sentences.chinese: 她正在采集摆放在餐桌上的鲜花。

sentences.english: The parterres will stay until the National Day on October 1.
sentences.chinese: 今年广场花坛摆放将一直延续到国庆节后。

sentences.english: Of course, some other peoples put SamSung of blessing salary birthday, add lucky energy of life.
sentences.chinese: 当然，有些人家摆放福禄寿三星，增添吉祥之气。

definition: to arrange/to set out/to decorate/to display/decorative items
junk/items of no value/various bits and bobs
to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
to receive/to accept/to take in/to hold
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
to lay/to place/to put in a certain place
